snippet: Rather than choosing between two consensus choices, Houston selected Carlos Correa, a 17-year-old, 6-foot-4 shortstop from Puerto Rico, as their top draft pick.
abstract: Houston Astros select Carlos Correa, a shortstop from Puerto Rico, with the first pick in the 2012 first year player draft.
lead_paragraph: Rather than choosing between two consensus choices, Houston selected Carlos Correa, a 17-year-old, 6-foot-4 shortstop from Puerto Rico, as their top draft pick.

headline.seo: Carlos Correa, Shortstop, Is Top Draft Pick, by Houston Astros
headline.main: Astros Defy Expectations With the Top Overall Pick
headline.print_headline: Astros Defy Expectations With the Top Overall Pick
